item.title: British Tough Guy Ray Winstone to Receive Sarajevo Festival Award
item.description: The ‘Sexy Beast’ and ‘Gentlemen’ star will receive the Honorary Heart of Sarajevo at the 31st Sarajevo Film Festival.
